content.raw: Acutally, I'd argue you just want `@PACKAGE_INCLUDE_INSTALL_DIR_FULL@`. This way, when you're writing proto files you can write `import "ignition/msgs/pose.proto";`. Otherwise, it would simple be `import "pose.proto"`, which would be ambiguous between protos in your project and protos from ignition.
content.html: Acutally, I'd argue you just want @PACKAGE_INCLUDE_INSTALL_DIR_FULL@. This way, when you're writing proto files you can write import "ignition/msgs/pose.proto";. Otherwise, it would simple be import "pose.proto", which would be ambiguous between protos in your project and protos from ignition.
